title: CLI option "--fail-on-skipped" unknown
body:
| Q                   | A
| --------------------| ---------------
| PHPUnit version     | 9.4.2
| PHP version         | 7.3.20
| Installation Method | Composer

#### Summary

Unknown option "--fail-on-skipped"

#### Current behavior

when calling on CLI via `vendor/bin/phpunit --fail-on-skipped`  the exit code is `1`.
thw followinf error message is printed:
```
PHPUnit 9.4.2 by Sebastian Bergmann and contributors.

Unknown option "--fail-on-skipped"
```


#### How to reproduce

call `phpunit` on CLI with `--fail-on-skipped` option

#### Expected behavior

according to `vendor/bin/phpunit --help` there is an option listed under "Test Execution Options":
```
  --fail-on-skipped           Treat skipped tests as failures
```
